brainly_data.question: Clostridium botulinum is a pathogenic organism that has been shown to be of some benefit as well being potentially dangerous to humans. it was first discovered as one type of food poisoning, but it is now being used by cosmetic surgeons as a way to remove wrinkles. this organisms is best classified as a
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.text: Bacterium // Not all bacteria are solely pathogens.This one causes food poisioning and is also used for Botox injections.
